author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Thirty-Five! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Firelock Games answer to a Mordheim-Style adventure warband game is PORT ROYAL, the Warband Skirmish game of piracy in the Searover's Carribean. Assemble a crew, take to the streets of this Sword and Muskey era Jamaican city and carve out a legend for yourself using Firelock's massive range of plastic kits and accessories. Let's dive in!

Check out the rulebook in digital  or physical HERE: https://firelockgames.com/pages/port-royal
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 035 - PORT ROYAL  by Firelock Games
